metadata.title: CVE-2015-9097 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The mail gem before 2.5.5 for Ruby (aka A Really Ruby Mail Library) isvulnerable to SMTP command injection via CRLF sequences in a RCPT TO orMAIL FROM command, as demonstrated by CRLF sequences immediately before andafter a DATA substring.

criterions.comment: ruby-mail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
